import { Card, Row, Col, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import companyLogo from "../../../../Asset/images/companylogo.png"; import { IoLocationSharp } from "react-icons/io5"; import { FaSuitcase, FaInfoCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; import styles from "./style/style.module.css"; const Jobs = ({ jobdetails }) => { return ( {jobdetails.company} {jobdetails.role} {/* Location */} {jobdetails.location} {/* Experience */} {jobdetails.exp}
Apply before {jobdetails.deadline}
); }; export default Jobs;
